attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it clear to drug takers, that if they  should be convicted of a crime, that they will receive no drugs whilst imprisoned. (If they know this prior to any crime they might be thinking of carrying out, it might make them think again before commiting such a deed)

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
